entry.string: oc process -f https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sogis/pipelines/simi_v2/api_webgisclient/landreg-service/deployment/deploymentconfig.yaml -p NAMESPACE=gdi-integration -p TAG=v2.0.0 -p REPLICAS=1 -p CPU_REQUEST=16m -p CPU_LIMIT=500m -p MEMORY_REQUEST=75Mi -p MEMORY_LIMIT=150Mi | oc apply -n gdi-integration -f- oc rollout latest -n gdi-integration landreg-service oc rollout status -n gdi-integration dc landreg-service
